scripts.text:
insert into [dbo].Energy_Coeff_Monthly([mnthly_AvgVal],[mnthly_strt_dt],[mnthly_end_dt],energy_type,country_code,data_source,YrMnth)

SELECT 
	avG([value])[mnthly_AvgVal],
	MIN(cast(start_time as date))  [mnthly_strt_dt],
	MAX(cast(end_time as date))[mnthly_end_dt],
	'Electricity' energy_type ,
	'FIN' country_code,
	'FinGrid' data_source ,
	CONCAT(YEAR(MIN(cast(start_time as date))),FORMAT(MIN(cast(start_time as date)),'MM') ) as YrMnth
	FROM 
	[dbo].TempEnergy_Coeff_Monthly
group by 
	Concat(cast(substring(convert(varchar, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, start_time) , 0), 112), 0, 7) as int),'01')
having  
	MIN(cast(start_time as date)) not in (select distinct cast([mnthly_strt_dt]as date) from [dbo].Energy_Coeff_Monthly)

----Below code will Update YrMnth date column-----

	Update Yrmn
	set YrMnth=cast(format(mnthly_strt_dt,'yyyyMM') AS int)
	from  [dbo].Energy_Coeff_Monthly Yrmn

;WITH data AS (
  SELECT 
    mnthly_strt_dt, 
    mnthly_AvgVal,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY mnthly_strt_dt) AS row_num
  FROM 
	Energy_Coeff_Monthly
), 
sum_data AS (
  SELECT 
	row_num,
	mnthly_AvgVal,
    mnthly_strt_dt, 
    SUM(mnthly_AvgVal) OVER (ORDER BY mnthly_strt_dt ROWS BETWEEN 11 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS sum_mnthly_AvgVal
  FROM 
	data
),FindRolling as
(
SELECT 
  mnthly_strt_dt, 
  mnthly_AvgVal,row_num,
  sum_mnthly_AvgVal / 12 AS Coeff_Rolling_12M
FROM 
	sum_data 
WHERE 
	row_num >= 12
)
--select * 
Update en_co_mon
set rolling_12m_units=Coeff_Rolling_12M
from 
	FindRolling fin Inner join [dbo].[energy_coeff_Monthly] en_co_mon
on fin.mnthly_strt_dt=en_co_mon.mnthly_strt_dt

INSERT INTO [dbo].[CO2_emission]
           ([building_ID]
           ,[site_ID]
           ,[building_name]
           ,[Heating_Network]
           ,[Company_ID]
           ,[Network_ID]
           ,[yrmnth]
           ,[energy_type]
           ,[rolling_12m_units]
           ,[Total_emission_energy_cal]
           ,[Total_emission_efficiency_cal])

SELECT DISTINCT
	di_bui.building_ID,
	di_sit.site_id,
	di_sit.street AS building_name,
	di_sit.Heating_Network,
	di_sit.company_id,
	di_sit.network_id,
	cast(format(en_coe.mnthly_strt_dt,'yyyyMM') AS int) AS [yrmnth],
	en_mon_bui.energy_type AS energy_type,
	en_mon_bui.q_total AS rolling_12_units,
	en_mon_bui.q_total* en_coe.rolling_12m_units/100000 AS Total_emission_energy_cal,
	NULL AS Total_emission_efficiency_cal
FROM
    Energy_Coeff_Monthly  en_coe
	INNER JOIN [dbo].[energy_monthly_building] en_mon_bui on en_mon_bui.mnthly_strt_dt=en_coe.mnthly_strt_dt
	INNER JOIN [dbo].[dim_building] di_bui on di_bui.building_ID=en_mon_bui.building_ID
	INNER JOIN [dbo].[dim_site] di_sit on di_sit.site_ID=di_bui.site_ID
	
WHERE 
	lower(en_mon_bui.energy_type)='electricity' and  
	di_bui.Rec_Status='Active' and
	di_sit.Rec_Status='Active'	 
	and Concat(di_bui.building_ID,di_sit.site_id,cast(format(en_coe.mnthly_strt_dt,'yyyyMM') AS int) ) NOT IN (select distinct concat( building_id,site_id,yrmnth ) from [dbo].[CO2_emission] where lower(energy_type)='electricity' )

ORDER BY 
	1
